item.description:
The Agenda so far
Aaron White
Analytics + A/B testing
- measuring just enough, not too much,
- developing a plan for what % time spent optimizing
- optimization around the sales process

Customer Development (the early stages)
- Avoiding the "survey" problem Blank wrote about today
- What's testable, and what's a leap of faith, and how can you tell?

John Prendergast
The Orthoganal Pivot - From finance to blogging and how our business got here
If people are interested, I'm planning to preview a new product we just launched called GutenBlog.net as a case study in customer development leading to a potential pivot (or in this case option value)
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk and come up to the 14th Floor
item.name: Lean Startup Circle Boston November Meetup
